clues.text: The Festival of Historic Houses is an annual June event in this capital of Rhode Island

The world's largest stand of sand pine scrub oak is in Ocala National Forest in this state

rounds.comments: (Mayim: These are tourism slogans used within the last few years.)

clues.text: Malawi is "The warm heart of" this landmass
A tourism slogan for this Middle East country is the "Land of Creation"
This type of area that you might visit in the Caribbean country of Antigua & Barbuda "is just the beginning"
Elevate your game in this nation, "The Pyrenean Country"
In a literary reference, a tourism slogan says, "Colombia is magical" this
General term for the official monetary unit of a nation
Golf is one type of this; parasol is another
When a lumbering lineman talks to the referee before a play, he may be making himself this, able to legally catch a pass
Type of complete breakdown that's in the name of a bee colony disorder
Some workplaces have this network of linked computers, sort of the company-wide web
Enzo Ferrari is said to have quipped, "Ask a child to draw a car, & certainly he will draw it" in this color, a Ferrari favorite
It seemed a bit excessive, but in 2018 one of this company's roadsters was sent into space
Since 2002 this model, with a name from the Japanese word kanmuri, has been the USA's bestselling passenger car
The I-Pace electric SUV from this British automaker purrs like a kitten
Lamborghini's Sesto Elemento was named for its pioneering use of this, from which much of the car is made
Made Henry Clay Secretary of State; 2 years after the White House, settled into a new House (of Representatives)
Saw $40 billion in losses in one bad stock market year; signed Smoot-Hawley to raise tariffs, which did not help
Attacked Canada, who obviously had it coming; beat DeWitt Clinton by 39 Electoral College votes
Had a cold, went out to buy veggies anyway; got pneumonia, died before 31st full day on the job
Increased the minimum wage to $1; approved & opened the St. Lawrence Seaway
In a 1969 novel Germans tell POWs that their residence is Schlachthof-Funf, this title place

To give a glossy appearance to something; it's also done to protect paintings
This 3-syllable verb means to expose to air
From Latin for "to sway", it means to sway between possible choices
From Latin for "love", it means to regard with devotion or reverence
Martial art taught by Master Po & Master Kan to young Kwai Chang Caine

Name for heroic poetry like "The Iliad" & films like "Ben Hur"

rounds.text: Since 1700 Britain has had only 3 reigning queens: Victoria, Elizabeth II, & this woman
